abstract: The parent company of American Airlines said that it was again considering selling American Eagle even as it named a new chief executive for the subsidiary.
snippet: The parent company of American Airlines said that it was again considering selling American Eagle even as it named a new chief executive for the subsidiary.
lead_paragraph: 12:29 p.m. | Corrected The parent company of American Airlines said on Thursday that it was again considering selling American Eagle, its regional airline unit, even as it named a new chief executive for the subsidiary.

headline.main: American Airlines Again Considers Sale of Regional Unit
